name: Bipolar Quest
description:
This game is about experiencing bipolar through a person with bipolar disorder. You will play through the story of Benjamin, a guy living with Bipolar Disorder as a university student. The game aims to make the player understand the experience they went through, and view the world via the eyes of Benjamin. 

FEATURES :

- Interactive content & Clickable Audio

- Multiple Endings

- Unique Scenes & Encounters

•---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------•

⚠️WARNING⚠️

This game is for educational purposes only and does not substitute for professional diagnosis, treatment, guidance, or advice. 

 If you relate to this game, we advise you to consult a mental health professional for help. 

Contain minor graphic depiction of violence. 

•---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------•
